question: What is the primary function of the website?

options.option: To improve our company and brand image
Help customers choose products and services
Provide information to our stake holders

question: How many visitors do you expect to vist the site every day?
How many visitors do you expect to use the site simultaneously?
From which countries do you mainly expect your visitors from?
What will be the content of the proposed website?

options.option: Product and service descriptions and pricing

question: How frequently will content be changed?

options.option: Once in a week or so

question: How do you want your website to be customised for visitiors?
How many people from your organisation will change the content on the web site?
What will be the roles of the people who change the content?

options.option: Change only specific information on the website
Add new methods to make computations

question: What will be the skill levels of the people who are involved in changing the content?

options.option: Basic computing, know how to used Word and Excel
Some computing knowledge for developing internal applications
Professional programming for solution architecting and implementation

question: How will be content management be performed?

options.option: Nominated people will make changes directly and publish
Nominated people will make changes and content will be published after approval

question: What kind of content management will be performed?

options.option: Add new content within the existing format
Create new funtionalities and work flows

question: What kind of data will be required to be gathered from the website?

options.option: Data and interactions used in interactive elements

question: Who will be optimising the site for search performance?
Is there a requirement to develop one time landing pages internally?

options.option: Yes, we are looking for a CMS with capabilities to build a landing page without the need to go to agency for design

question: What are your data collection requirements?

options.option: It must be possible to build forms without the tech team
Data export must be easily possible

question: Asset management features?

options.option: Ability to add and categorize images

question: What is the type of technical architecture you need for your CMS?
Does the site need to integrate with 3rd party applications?
What are the API integrations you looking for?
Does the UI require visual interaction such as graphs, charts, and other interactive experiences?
Which UI framework would you like to integrate with?
What type of themes do you require in the CMS?
What are your expectations from a CMS at a component level?

options.option: Simple text, image and video components [Factory setup]

question: What would be your preferred CMS from among...

options.option: Open source CMS, where no licence fee is required
Proprietary CMS, requiring a licence fee to be paid in a predetermined frequency
SaaS CMS, typically charged for based on usage volumes

question: How would you like to track activities on the CMS?

options.option: Out of the box CMS feature

question: How would you like CMS updates to be managed?
